p: The WHC was determined using a previously reported method [ 43]. Briefly, the initial volume ( V 1) occupied by PD1-1 (500 mg) in a test tube was recorded. Next, distilled water (10 mL) was added, the mixture was allowed to stand for 12 h at room temperature, and the new volume ( V 2) of the wetted powder was recorded. This test was repeated using a phosphate buffer (pH 6.86) and 0.1 mol/L HCl instead of distilled water. The SC was calculated using the following formula: SC (%) = ( V 2 − V 1)/ V 1 × 100.
